actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to deauthorize the Cross Florida Barge Canal, and to assist the State of Florida in preservation of the canal corridor as a greenway.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to deauthorize the Cross Florida Barge Canal project. Declares that in consideration of such deauthorization the Secretary of the Army shall transfer lands authorized for such project to the State of Florida which shall use such lands to create a State park or State conservation area.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to deauthorize the Cross Florida Barge Canal, and to assist the State of Florida in preservation of the canal corridor as a greenway.
